traySettings.title: System Tray Settings
traySettings.notAvailable: This feature is only available in the desktop app
traySettings.downloadHint: Please download the desktop app to use system tray features
traySettings.displayModeDesc: Choose the display mode for the system tray menu
traySettings.compactModeDesc: Compact Mode - Show core features only
traySettings.showIconsDesc: Show emoji icons before menu items
traySettings.showShortcutsDesc: Show keyboard shortcuts after menu items
traySettings.menuConfigDesc: Customize menu item visibility and order (checkbox indicates compact mode visibility)
traySettings.compactPreviewDesc: The following {count} items will be shown in compact mode
